## [Pronunciation](/en/post/pronunciation/)
/ɪkˈstɜːrnəl/

## Definitions
- **[Adjective](/en/post/adjective/)**: Pertaining [to](/en/post/to/) [the](/en/post/the/) [outside](/en/post/outside/) [or](/en/post/or/) [outer](/en/post/outer/) [part](/en/post/part/); [not](/en/post/not/) [internal](/en/post/internal/) [or](/en/post/or/) [within](/en/post/within/) [something](/en/post/something/) [else](/en/post/else/). [It](/en/post/it/) describes [what](/en/post/what/) is [on](/en/post/on/) [the](/en/post/the/) [surface](/en/post/surface/) [or](/en/post/or/) [beyond](/en/post/beyond/) [the](/en/post/the/) boundaries [of](/en/post/of/) [a](/en/post/a/) [thing](/en/post/thing/), [system](/en/post/system/), [or](/en/post/or/) [organization](/en/post/organization/).

[Example](/en/post/example/) sentences:
- _**[Adjective](/en/post/adjective/)**_: 
  - "[The](/en/post/the/) [external](/en/post/external/) features [of](/en/post/of/) [the](/en/post/the/) [house](/en/post/house/) [include](/en/post/include/) [a](/en/post/a/) [large](/en/post/large/) [garden](/en/post/garden/) [and](/en/post/and/) [a](/en/post/a/) [white](/en/post/white/) picket [fence](/en/post/fence/)."
  - "[The](/en/post/the/) [external](/en/post/external/) [hard](/en/post/hard/) [drive](/en/post/drive/) stores [all](/en/post/all/) [my](/en/post/my/) backup files."
  - "[External](/en/post/external/) factors [such](/en/post/such/) [as](/en/post/as/) [weather](/en/post/weather/) conditions [can](/en/post/can/) [affect](/en/post/affect/) [the](/en/post/the/) game's [outcome](/en/post/outcome/)."

## Phrases
- "[External](/en/post/external/) [environment](/en/post/environment/)": [The](/en/post/the/) broader [surroundings](/en/post/surroundings/) [or](/en/post/or/) context [that](/en/post/that/) influences an entity, [like](/en/post/like/) [market](/en/post/market/) conditions [for](/en/post/for/) [a](/en/post/a/) [business](/en/post/business/).
- "[External](/en/post/external/) [conflict](/en/post/conflict/)": [A](/en/post/a/) [struggle](/en/post/struggle/) [between](/en/post/between/) [a](/en/post/a/) [character](/en/post/character/) [and](/en/post/and/) an [outside](/en/post/outside/) [force](/en/post/force/) [in](/en/post/in/) [literature](/en/post/literature/) [or](/en/post/or/) [film](/en/post/film/).
- "[External](/en/post/external/) [link](/en/post/link/)": [In](/en/post/in/) websites, [this](/en/post/this/) refers [to](/en/post/to/) [a](/en/post/a/) hyperlink pointing [to](/en/post/to/) [another](/en/post/another/) website [rather](/en/post/rather/) [than](/en/post/than/) [to](/en/post/to/) [a](/en/post/a/) [page](/en/post/page/) [within](/en/post/within/) [the](/en/post/the/) [same](/en/post/same/) [site](/en/post/site/).

## [Example](/en/post/example/) Sentences
- "[The](/en/post/the/) [external](/en/post/external/) wounds were treated [first](/en/post/first/) [before](/en/post/before/) moving [onto](/en/post/onto/) [internal](/en/post/internal/) injuries."
- "[We](/en/post/we/) [need](/en/post/need/) [to](/en/post/to/) [consider](/en/post/consider/) [both](/en/post/both/) [internal](/en/post/internal/) [and](/en/post/and/) [external](/en/post/external/) candidates [for](/en/post/for/) [the](/en/post/the/) [job](/en/post/job/) [position](/en/post/position/)."
- "[The](/en/post/the/) [company](/en/post/company/) needs [to](/en/post/to/) [adapt](/en/post/adapt/) [to](/en/post/to/) changes [in](/en/post/in/) [the](/en/post/the/) [external](/en/post/external/) [economic](/en/post/economic/) [climate](/en/post/climate/)."
